response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and bring immense value to your life, just like it has done for many others. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $8,000. However, to facilitate a smooth transaction and considering the current market conditions, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive introductory price of $7,500. This special offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to make your decision promptly. Should you choose to proceed, I assure you of a seamless and personalized service tailored to your needs. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
